name: Free Online CSR Generator - Pure Tools
description: Free online CSR generator: create RSA/EC key pairs locally and generate PKCS#10 CSRs with SAN/KeyUsage/EKU options.
seoDescription: Free online CSR (Certificate Signing Request) generator that runs fully in your browser using WebCrypto. Generate RSA or EC (P-256/P-384/P-521) key pairs and PKCS#10 CSRs with Subject, optional SAN, KeyUsage and ExtendedKeyUsage. Choose signature hash, optionally auto-fill SAN from CN, copy/download CSR/private/public keys, and download everything as a ZIP. No private key uploads.

ui.title: CSR / Certificate Request Generator
ui.description: This tool uses browser WebCrypto to generate keys and a PKCS#10 CSR. Runs completely locally and never uploads your private key/CSR.
ui.autoSanFromCnLabel: If SAN is empty, use CN as SAN
ui.autoSanFromCnHint: Many CAs only check SAN (and ignore CN), so it is recommended to keep this on.
ui.kuKeyEnciphermentDisabledHint: keyEncipherment is typically not needed for EC/ECDSA (often only digitalSignature).
ui.tip: Tip: Submit the CSR to your CA to request a certificate. Never upload your private key. This tool outputs a standard PKCS#8 private key.
ui.countryLengthError: C (Country) should be a 2-letter country code, e.g. CN/US.
ui.webcryptoUnavailableError: WebCrypto (crypto.subtle) is unavailable. Please use HTTPS and a modern browser.
